detail_desc: Long-sleeved top in soft, ribbed jersey with a V-neck and button placket.

Boots in imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft with lacing at the front and a zip in the side. Loop at the back and a decorative welt seam around the soles. Fleece linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel approx. 2.5 cm.
Velour bracelet with a snap-on strap and soft toy head with embroidered details and appliqués. Size 3.5x20 cm.
Trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Blouse in cotton seersucker with a sewn-in wrapover front and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication. Sewn-on tie belt at the waist and a flared peplum.

prod_name: TP MAGNUS sweatpant w panel SB
detail_desc: Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with contrasting colour side stripes. Elasticated ribbing at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Socks in a fine-knit cotton blend with elastication at the top.
Dress in striped cotton poplin with a collar, buttons at the front and 3/4-length sleeves with buttons at the cuffs. Seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt, and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, and a hood with an adjustable tab and metal fastener at the back. Zipped handwarmer pockets, flap front pockets with concealed press-studs, inner ribbing at the cuffs and an elasticated drawstring at the back of the hem. Longer at the back. Lined.
Poncho knitted in a soft viscose blend with a hole for the head and a draped effect on one shoulder.
5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, press-studs down the front and along one leg, and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Short swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Loose-fitting sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with an integral sports bra and a racer back. Sports bra with a double layer of fabric at the front, elasticated hem and opening at the back with crossover straps.
Jacket in supple suede with a collar, buttons down the front, welt side pockets and flap chest pockets with a button. Adjustable tab and button at the sides, and buttoned cuffs. Lined.
Trainers in glittery imitation leather with a lightly padded edge, elasticated lacing at the front, toning heel caps and a small loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned rubber soles.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
T-shirt in a modal and cotton blend with a round, slightly deeper neckline.

Short dress in an airy cotton weave with a small, smocked stand-up collar, V-neck and short, scallop-edged sleeves. Smocking at the waist and a flared skirt with a scalloped hem. Broderie anglaise on the sleeves, front and skirt. Unlined.
Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a round neckline, concealed button placket, flap chest pockets, 3/4-length sleeves and short slits in the sides. Unlined.
Cropped top in light sweatshirt fabric with an embroidered appliqué on the front. Unlined drawstring hood, short cropped sleeves and cropped raw-edge hem.
Cropped, fitted top in jersey containing glittery threads with a V-neck, wrapover front and long sleeves.

Car coat in twill with a collar, concealed buttons down the front, diagonal welt front pockets and inner pockets. Long raglan sleeves with an adjustable tab at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined in satin made from recycled polyester.
Trousers in a soft, patterned viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and elasticated hems.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.

Short dress in an airy organic cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Wide neckline with a V-shaped opening and narrow ties at the top, and long raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Running top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and reflective details. Regular fit.
Short running shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist. Lined with short sports shorts.

Short-sleeved shirt in an Oxford cotton weave with a button-down collar and classic front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, an open chest pocket and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist and discreet pockets in the side seams.
Shorter top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and a raw-edge hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trousers in a soft, patterned viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and elasticated hems.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, ties at the sides and medium coverage at the back.
5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Patterned fancy dress costume with a zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Hood with embroidery and appliqués, and a detachable tail with a hook and loop fastening.
Calf-length wrap dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck, a seam with a tie belt at the waist and long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Pyjamas with a long-sleeved top in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a print motif, and bottoms in a patterned weave with an elasticated waist.
Top in soft, printed cotton jersey with short puff sleeves.

Trousers in a pattern weave containing glittery threads with covered elastication at the back of the waist and a zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, jetted back pockets, a slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with creases.
Headband in a soft knit containing some wool and mohair.
Cargo trousers in cotton twill with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, and ribbed hems. Fake fly, side pockets, flap leg pockets and fake back pockets with a flap.
Handbag accessory in the shape of a tied scarf in a patterned weave with a sewn-in metal keyring and carabiner hook. Length approx. 34 cm.
Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Pyjama bottoms in cotton flannel with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and tapered legs.
Round-necked T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with a chest pocket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Short, sleeveless dress in a patterned weave that is fitted at the top. Concealed zip and a hook-and-eye fastener at the back, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Lined.

Shirt in an airy, slub cotton weave with a grandad collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Chest pocket, long sleeves with a tab and button, buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Low, imitation leather sandals with an elasticated heel strap. Rubber insoles and soles.
Short-sleeved top in printed, fast-drying functional fabric.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a reversible sequin motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Backpack in grained imitation leather with an imitation suede front. Handle and zip at the top, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps,a zipped outer compartment and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 11x22x31 cm.
Scarf in a soft jacquard weave.
Swimsuit in UV-protective material with a print motif at the top, small stand-up collar and a zip at the back. Short raglan sleeves and short legs. UPF50.
Soft, non-wired lace bra with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage and an elasticated hem. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Satin-covered Alice band with appliqués on the top.
Fitted top in soft jersey made from a modal blend with cap sleeves and gathers in the side seams for best fit.
Large earrings in hammered metal. Length 5.5 cm.
Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit, leggings and hat in soft organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch. Leggings with wide foldover ribbing at the waist.
Short dress in patterned viscose twill with pleats at the top to create width. Small stand-up collar, covered buttons at the top long, wide sleeves, and cuffs with covered buttons. Unlined.
Trunks in stretch jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs. The cotton content of the trunks is organic.
Jersey-lined joggers in stretch, supersoft denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, a back pocket, side pockets and tapered legs.

Trousers in satin with a high waist that has covered elastication and loops, one with a decorative D-ring. Diagonal side pockets, flap leg pockets with a tab and D-ring and long, tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.
Cable-knit jumper in a soft cotton blend with a V-neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Stocking-stitched back.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend.

Blouse and shorts in a cotton weave. Short-sleeved, crinkled blouse with a decorative frill at the top and buttons at the back. Printed shorts with pleats at the top and elastication at the waist and hems.
Top in viscose jersey with short, flounced sleeves and a straight hem with short slits in the sides.
Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Wide, calf-length dress in cotton twill with adjustable straps, press-studs at the sides and two chest pockets, one with a flap and button. Unlined.
Hair elastics.

Long cardigan in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs, hem and back of the neck. No buttons. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.

Fleece-lined boots with a water-repellent rubber lower section and soles. Soft shaft in water-repellent functional fabric with reflective strips at the bottom. Adjustable hook and loop tab at the ankle and an elasticated drawstring at the top.
Oversized sports top in fast-drying jersey with a deep neckline at the back with horizontal straps at the back of the neck and short cap sleeves. Longer and rounded at the back.

Set with a top, shorts and sun hat in cotton. Jersey top with a small text print at the top, short flounced sleeves and an opening with a button at the back of the neck.Shorts in a patterned weave with an elasticated waist and elasticated hems. Sun hat in a patterned weave with ties at the chin and a cotton lining.
Espadrilles with a moccasin seam and tab at the front and a jute trim around the soles. Twill linings, leather insoles and rubber soles.
Hipster briefs in soft modal jersey with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Bikini top with lightly padded cups, a decorative knot detail at the front, side support and a silicone trim at the top. Detachable ties at the neck and a tie at the back.
Fine-knit jumper made partly from recycled polyester with a V-neck, dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves. Decorative seam centre front and back, and a straight-cut hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with buttons on one shoulder.
